sentences.cn: 宇航员在失重的条件下工作。

sentences.en: Bacterial reproduction is accelerated in weightless space.
sentences.cn: 在失重的空间,细菌繁殖加快了.

sentences.en: Helen described life in a weightless environment during her period in space.
sentences.cn: 海伦描述了她身处太空时失重状态下的生活。

sentences.en: Hot drinks are quite dangerous in weightless conditions.
sentences.cn: 在失重的状态下,热饮料是很危险的.

sentences.en: I'm mile high feeling weightless off the ground.
sentences.cn: 我英里高离地面失重的感觉.

sentences.en: Knowledge is weightless, a treasure you can always carry easily.
sentences.cn: 知识不是负担, 它是你可以始终轻松携带的财富.

sentences.en: New fresh ground technology delivers a microlight powder, virtually weightless, that blends perfectly on the skin.
sentences.cn: 全新的科技以一层超轻粉末, 几乎无重, 完美地和肤色溶为一体.

sentences.en: One experiment will test if chicken eggs can survive in a weightless environment.
sentences.cn: 一项实验是检验鸡蛋在失重情况下能否存活.

sentences.en: Photons have no mass – they are weightless.
sentences.cn: 光子没有质量——它们是没有重量的。

sentences.en: Scientists show how Salmonella food bacteria in space become more virulent in their weightless surroundings.
sentences.cn: 科学家显示腔隙的沙门氏菌食物细菌如何在他们的无重量环境方面变得更有毒.

sentences.en: We feel weightless when the elevator descends.
sentences.cn: 当电梯下降时,我们会感到失重.

sentences.en: Weightless and stylish, the V 3 Bluetooth headset an accessory of beautiful purpose.
sentences.cn: 失重和时尚, v3蓝牙耳机,是从犯美丽的目的.

words.tran_cn: [数] 加权的；加重的；衡量过的
重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
加重，加权；衡量；（英）生活补贴
称量（weigh的现在分词形式）；考虑斟酌
加重量于…；重压（weight的过去分词）
重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚

trans.tran_cn: 没有重量的，失重的，无重力的
trans.tran_en: something that is weightless seems to have no weight, especially when it is floating in space or water
